posts.title: Carrot powered vehicle carrot number calculator
posts.content: This is a really dumb thing that I made for a project about calculating how many carrots it would take to get a cat to space. In the end, I couldn't actually figure out some of the rocket related maths, and so instead just calculated the amount I'd need for a car trip. This is a calculator I made to do all the maths for me. If you fancy making a carrot powered vehicle (I have no idea why anyone would ever be in that situation), here's a calculator to see how many carrots you'd need!
